sentences.english: Furthermore, the rheologic performance and film-forming of the emulsion were inspected.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乳液的室溫流變性並跟蹤了乳液的成膜情況。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the rheologic performance and film-forming of the emulsion were inspected.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乳液的室溫流變性並跟蹤了乳液的成膜情況。

sentences.english: The powder and the composite emulsion were characterized by FTIR.
sentences.chinese: 用FTIR對粉體和苯丙複合乳液進行了表徵。

sentences.english: I just love this lotion and the whole line of products.
sentences.chinese: 我只喜歡這款乳液以及這個品牌的全線產品。

sentences.english: The title alkyd resin modified waterborne nitrocellulose emulsion was prepared by alkyd resin phase inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 採用醇酸樹脂相反轉乳化法制備了硝化纖維素乳液。

sentences.english: Polysiloxane emulsions were prepared through emulsion ionic ring-opening polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 採用乳液離子開環聚合手段製備了聚有機硅氧烷乳液。

sentences.english: Polysiloxane emulsions were prepared through emulsion ionic ring-opening polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 採用乳液離子開環聚合手段製備了聚有機硅氧烷乳液。

sentences.english: Cream, oil, or powder can be applied periodically to reduce possible irritation.
sentences.chinese: 定期的塗抹乳液，按摩油或者粉餅能夠減輕刺激。

sentences.english: Micro-emulsion nano-reactor can be used in preparing nano-particles.
sentences.chinese: 微乳液納米反應器可用於納米微粒的製備。

sentences.english: The polyacrylate nano-particle has been prepared by use of emulsion polymerization technology.
sentences.chinese: 通過乳液聚合，製備了聚丙烯酸酯納米粒子。

sentences.english: The tests showed emulsifier effect markedly on comprehensive performance of core-shell emulsion and coating film.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，乳化劑對乳液及塗料綜合性能影響顯著。

sentences.english: The synthesis method of stiffening agent was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用丙烯酸酯核殼共聚乳液生產硬挺劑的方法。

sentences.english: You can warm the lotion before applying to skin by rubbing vigorously between palms. when massaging, use gentle circular strokes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以將乳液在兩手掌中摩擦來溫暖乳液後再塗沫。

sentences.english: You can warm the lotion before applying to skin by rubbing vigorously between palms. when massaging, use gentle circular strokes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以將乳液在兩手掌中摩擦來溫暖乳液後再塗沫。

sentences.english: Emulsion polymerization is an important method to produce high polymer.
sentences.chinese: 乳液聚合是生產高聚物的重要方法。

sentences.english: Satin Ni made from emulsion micelles has softness appearance and pure white color.
sentences.chinese: 添加乳液膠束所鍍得的緞面鎳，外觀柔和，色澤潔白。
